meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent2: Oh, geez, I can't believe it!
meanings.sent3: Geez, I forgot my lunch at home again!
meanings.sent4: The news hit him like a ton of bricks, geez!
meanings.sent5: The loud noise made him jump, geez!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of disbelief or annoyance.
meanings.sent2: Geez, why did you do that?
meanings.sent3: Geez, I can't find my keys anywhere!
meanings.sent4: The price of that item was through the roof, geez!
meanings.sent5: The crowd's reaction was deafening, geez!
